doc.after: Some scholars classify religions as either universal religions that seek worldwide acceptance and actively look for new converts or ethnic religions that are identified with a particular ethnic group and do not seek converts 58 Others reject the distinction pointing out that all religious practices whatever their philosophical origin are ethnic because they come from a particular culture 59 60 61
